commit message:
Single top launch mode

Avoid having the activity loaded more than once for each orientation.

Long touch to switch btw compile on change/save

Long touch the save icon to switch between compile on change and compile
on save.

Show FPS in spinner label

Plus minor improvements on the optional FPS gauge.

Also, only register listener for acceleration sensor if variable is located
in program.

Made fps members volatile

Those members get reset from UI thread.
Show all available values in comments
Updated comment to be more verbose

Get fps view every time anew instead of saving it

It's better to not save the view returned for R.id.fps because it's
impossible to know when Spinner does change the selected view; especially
when the adapter changes which may update the spinner not immediately.

Anyway, getSelectedView() and findViewById() are just lookups and this
method is only called every ShaderRenderer.FPS_UPDATE_FREQUENCY milliseconds
and if fps did actually change so that shoudln't be problem

Fixed loading of missing shaders

If a shader isn't available anymore choose another one at random.
Added method to get a random shader
Set values only if locations are found

Replaced String.isEmpty()

Because apparently that's not available on some devices. Weird.
Fixed dead-lock when no program is running

Exposed wallpaper offset

onOffsetChanged() is now propagated into shaders via the 'offset' vector.
Fixed error highlighting in compile on save mode
Moved save shader method into ListPreference
Preference to change update delay of editor
Preference to set editor text size

Removed targetSdkVersion to show Menu button

On tablets sporting Android >= 3.0 there is often no physical menu button
but a soft one which does only appear if you don't give the targetSdkVersion
option.
Removed invalidate() after text size change

Updated version code

I always forget this one.

Fixed resetting of soft keyboard

At first, I don't need to call setText() to update the text. It's enough
to change the Editable.

TextView.setText() will restart the InputMethodManager which will reset
the soft keyboard.

Second, don't use Editable.clearSpans() as it will remove too much.
Removing only the spans I added is enough.

Improved auto indenting

It's more suitable to check for certain characters than to indent always
in the middle of the line. Still, this is a very simple approximation to
auto indenting but it should do in this context.
Remove trailing white space on save

Fixed y-flipped rendering when using a frame buffer

If the texture frame buffer (backbuffer) is rendered first,
rendering to frame buffer 0 (the screen) next will result in
a flipped image (on the y axis).

Maybe that's because rendering into a texture is (by default?)
y-flipped because a textures origin (0/0) is always in the
bottom left. And maybe the transformation matrix does not get
reset on glBindFramebuffer( GL_FRAMEBUFFER, 0 ).

Anyway, rendering into frame buffer 0 first does fix the
problem.

Use fixed alpha for low pass filter

Previous calculation was wrong. t is the low pass' filter
time constant (!) and dT is the event delivery rate in nano
seconds.

Chose to use a constant for now (and to ignore delta time).

Added proper line-breaks

So it's better to read on the console.

Concat rotation delta instead of multiplication

Since rotation.xys starts with 0, multiplying by 0 doesn't
give anything of course.

Refactored gyroscope for rotation

The value contains rotation values.

Updated comments with latest features

Added battery and rotation values.

Gave a sample for how to access the backbuffer.

Show source if it's hidden and there's an error

Tapping on the bug symbol when the source is hidden
does now show the source.

Useful when compile-on-change is disabled, the source
is edited, get's hidden and then compiled.

Show overflow icon in action bar for Lollipop

Since some devices don't show nor have a menu button
to open the shader menu, it's vital to have a overflow
icon in the action bar to open the menu.

Bind texture again for drawing into framebuffer

Some drivers (e.g. on the Fairphone 1) require binding
the texture again after glDrawArrays() was called for
some reason.

Also removed the depth buffer of the framebuffer since
it's completely unnecessary for what this app does.

The backbuffer texture is cleared before use now.
Some drivers start with uninitialized texture data.
